title: Higher ping then normal
body:
hello there i am locking for help with my ping problem. 
my NORMAL ping range is 67-71 but some time now my ping stays at 99~ and i have nothing to do about it becous when i check my ping with ((echo off
ping 104.160.142.3 -t)) it says 67 - 71 ping but in game its 99 ...
so i dont know what to do here i am open for any help {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Edit : in a normal game i have 99 ping
in a solo practis i have 75 ping 
in a solo custom i have 81 ping
in a  custom with bot/s i have 99 ping wtf ?

replies.body: In this case, route to 31.186.224.42 instead which is the EUNE game server.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) as well so we can get a clear overview of how you're routing to us exactly.  Remove the first two IPs with dashes, run it for 5 minutes, and let me know what you find.
I'm having some issue. I usually have between 64-68.. Now I have 83-88
